item.title: Pitch Videos from Irish Start-Ups In Palo Alto
item.description: The Enterprise Ireland and InterTradeIreland VC Forum pitching event in Silicon Valley on Tuesday looks to have been a great event. Five Irish web start-ups pitched to a panel of local VCs and an invited audience. You can see all the videos over at the Paddy’s Valley blog. The really interesting part for me was the questions from the VCs. They have a very strong focus on competitive advantage. It’s well worth your time watching all five.
